description: Assigns one or more tags to a resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to tag.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The map of the key-value pairs used to tag the resource. (dict) --- A map of key-value pairs. The key to use in the tag. The value of the tag.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key to use in the tag.
